description: This file provides generic handlers for serializing and deserializing arrays of various types (integers, booleans, reals, strings, sub-structures) to and from JSON, as well as specialized handlers for specific array types. It is part of a larger JSON processing framework related to a project that likely uses JSON for configuration or data exchange.
